publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 63
ab.l: Miźmor David́ǵa bolɣanynda mid́barynda Juhudanyn. Ḱuč́ĺu Teńrim śeń šahar oḥujmyn saja suvsady saja ǯanym t́eĺḿaŕadir saja gufum pusta jerd́a da aryɣan suvsuz.
Kertid́ań išanamyn qodeš́t́a ḱorḿa hašɣaḥajny baḥma ḱuč́ujńu da syjyjny.
Ki jaḥšyraḥtyr ševaɣatyj t́erlikt́ań erińĺa- rim maḥtav b́ersińĺar saja.
Kertid́ań maḥtav b́erajim tiri eǵanim- d́a šemija ḱot́urajim uvučlarymny.
Qyjasa javdan da naḿet́t́ań tojdu ǯanym da bijańč́ erińĺar byla maḥtav b́ersiń avzum.
Eǵer saɣynsam śeni t́oš́agim üśt́uńa tan saruvlarynda śoźlejmiń saja.
Ki bolduj bolušluḥ maja da ḱoĺaǵasińd́a bujruḥlaryjnyn sarnarmyn.
Jabuštu ǯanym artyjdan śeniń ḿeni turadyr on qudratyj.
Da alar salma ǯuɣurɣa klejdirĺar ǯanymny keĺgejĺar t́ob́ańgi ǵorĺari- ńa ol jerniń.
Čaɣyra b́ergejĺar any qoluna qylyčnyn üĺuš́u t́uĺḱuĺarniń bolgejlar.
Da ol bij bijanir Teńri byla maḥtalyr bar ol ant́et́uv́č́u šemińd́ań anyn ki b́ekĺar avzun śoźĺav́- č́uĺarni jalɣanlyḥny.
